item.title: Missing bollard!!!!!!, 2nd July
item.description:
As you turn right out of Palace Street, you can't seen the raised kerbing at the pedestrian crossing point as there is no bollard. I have hit this on more than once occasion and reported more than once. FIX IT, you can also tell me where to send the bill for damaging my fucking vehicle!!!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Buckingham Palace Road, Victoria, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car abandoned on end of alley way., 2nd July
item.description:
A silver Vauxhall Corsa has been abandoned at the end of alley way, for the last hour and 10 minutes. It is parked outside our drive while also partially blocking the pavement and stopping the other residence from leaving their area as the path is blocked, also blocking emergency services from passing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitebeam Avenue, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deeply eroded highway surface on Park Hall Rd, 1st July
item.description:
Deeply eroded highway surface on entire carriageway of Park Hall Rd between railway bridge and Alleyn Road. Cracks, potholes and exposed aggregate make cycling very difficult and potentially dangerous. I have to wheel my bike along the pavement nowadays instead of riding it. This is a long standing issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Hall Road, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light shining into property at night, 1st July
item.description:
The lamp post at the bus stop is negatively impacting sleep as it shines directly into our property. We are unable to have the windows open at night as our bedroom is lit up by the lamp post.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 488, Hurst Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
